column1: Mrs. Vladchick, it is time. It is time to return to Romania.
Nid kelmin da bushka ayn zolt!
There's nowhere to go, Mrs. Vladchick. Pull over!
Be careful, Gabul! Be careful, Gabul! Yaaah!
Mrs. Janet Reno, you must understand, the father has right to his children.
Our home is Romania. We love it there.
If daughters will not return on their own, you must force them to return
Alright, it is time for us to return to Romania.
